entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Suffield
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
